 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָתֵק‎</span>] **verb** ==move, proceed, advance== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***etêku***</u></abbr> as H., also transitive ***bring, move***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***precede, pass forth, become free, grow old***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲתַק‎</span> ***grow old***, Palmyrene adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עתק‎</span> ***old***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽתְקָה‎</span> [[Ps.6.8|Ps 6:8]], 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽתְקוּ‎</span> [[Job.21.7|Job 21:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶעְתַּק‎</span> [[Job.14.18|Job 14:18]]; [[Job.18.4|Job 18:4]] — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **l.** ***move*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמְּקֹמוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצוּר יֶע‎</span> [[Job.14.18|Job 14:18]], so [[Job.18.4|Job 18:4]]. 

**2.** ***advance*** (in years; Aramaic sense) [[Job.21.7|Job 21:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִחְיוּ‎</span>); hence = grow old and weak [[Ps.6.8|Ps 6:8]] (of eye, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽשְׁשָׁה‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְתִּיקוּ‎</span> [[Job.32.16|Job 32:16]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] v[[Job.32.15|Job 32:15]]), [[Prov.25.1|Prov 25:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעְתֵּק‎</span> [[Gen.12.8|Gen 12:8]]; [[Gen.26.22|Gen 26:22]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְתִּיק‎</span> [[Job.9.5|Job 9:5]] — 

**1.** ***move forward*** (that is, tent) = proceed [[Gen.12.8|Gen 12:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative), [[Gen.26.22|Gen 26:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם‎</span>); so figurative [[Job.32.16|Job 32:16]] (see above) words ***have moved away*** from them (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵהֶם‎</span>), but see probably gloss ([[BDB#Bu|Bu]] and others). 

**2.** [[Job.9.5|Job 9:5]] ***he who removeth mountains***. 

**3.** very late [[Prov.25.1|Prov 25:1]] ***transcribe*** (***remove*** from one book or roll to another; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐξεγράψαντο</span>, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***transtulerunt***; so in mediaeval Hebrew: Zunz<sup>ZMG xxv (1871), 447 f. = Ges. Schr. iii. 66 f.</sup>).
